meta.project: Member and Agent Profile Management Platform

product_overview: A web platform providing multi-step profile creation and management flows for members and agents, including authentication, dashboards, and responsive design for various screen sizes.
core_goals: Enable seamless multi-step profile creation for members with validation and payment integration.
Provide an agent-specific multi-step profile creation process with step tracking and payment.
Offer robust authentication systems including login, registration, and OTP verification.
Deliver a responsive and user-friendly dashboard to access profiles and key functionalities.
Facilitate profile management with easy viewing and editing options.
Implement smooth navigation and routing within the application.
Ensure mobile responsive design across all features and components.
key_features: Member Profile Flow with six steps plus payment integration and form validation.
Agent Profile Flow with seven steps and payment integration.
User and Agent Dashboards with responsive layouts.
Authentication system including login, registration, and OTP verification.
Landing Page showcasing hero section, features, packages, and How It Works.
Profile Management allowing users to view and edit their profiles.
Step Tracker component to visualize progress through multi-step forms.
API utilities for data fetching, posting, and interaction with backend services.
Application routing with private route guards for secure access.
Responsive navigation components including Top Bar, Sidebar, Navbar, and Main Navigation.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the Landing Page and browses features and packages.
User registers or logs in via Authentication system with optional OTP verification.
User chooses to create a Member or Agent profile and completes multi-step forms with progress tracking.
User submits payment details in the final step of profile creation flows.
User accesses Dashboard to view profile, manage settings, and explore functionalities.
User can edit profile information anytime through Profile Management feature.
Navigation components assist throughout the journey ensuring smooth transitions and access.
validation_criteria: Multi-step forms enforce field validation for accurate data entry.
Payment steps securely handle transaction processing and respond to success or failure states.
Authentication flows protect user access and validate credentials.
Dashboards render correctly on desktop and mobile devices maintaining responsiveness.
Profile data updates reflect immediately and persist in backend services.
Routing enforces private access to authenticated pages only.
UI components adhere to responsive design and usability standards across all devices.
